TopicTitle: Hotkey for opening/closing all solar panels at once?

Articles.Content:
Is there a Hotkey for opening/closing all solar panels at once?

Edited April 5, 2014 by Bearsh
Just set it as an action group and then activate said action group.
You can set up such a button using action groups: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Action_group
